title: Open-Access Online Learning for Volunteer Leadership Development

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Primarily smartphone-based mobile learning with monthly offline meetings. Focuses on strengthening service leadership competencies for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain three practical strategies for effective team leadership in volunteer settings.
Learners can design and share motivation strategies for volunteers using digital platforms.
Learners can propose community problem-solving solutions by planning science education-linked volunteer projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
